member.name: T:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings
member.summary: Interface for any Application provider.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings.DefaultDomain
member.summary: Gets or sets the default domain.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings.LdapPort
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP port.
member.remarks: Optional, defaults to 636 -- the default port for LDAPS (i.e. LDAP over TLS). A common alternative is to use the default LDAP port, 389, however this port typically is not-secured and requires the "StartTLS" flag enabled.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings.LdapHostnames
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP hostnames.
member.remarks: Required, one or more hostnames or IP addresses which expose an LDAP/LDAPS service endpoint that will be connected to. If more than one host is specified, then each will be tried in turn until a successful, secure connection is established.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings.LdapPassword
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP password.

member.name: P:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IAppSettings.LdapUsername
member.summary: Gets or sets the LDAP username.

member.name: T:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IPasswordChangeProvider
member.summary: Represents a interface for a password change provider.

member.name: M:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IPasswordChangeProvider.PerformPasswordChange(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Performs the password change using the credentials provided.
member.returns: The API error item or null if the change password operation was successful.

member.name: M:Unosquare.PassCore.Common.IPasswordChangeProvider.MeasureNewPasswordDistance(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compute the distance between two strings. Take it from https://www.csharpstar.com/csharp-string-distance-algorithm/.
